meanings.definition: A mineral consisting essentially of manganese dioxide and occurring in black or dark brown earthy or compact masses.
meanings.sent1: The geologist found a chunk of pyrolusites during the excavation.
meanings.sent2: Miners extracted pyrolusites from the deep underground mines.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel mistook pyrolusites for shiny acorns and tried to bury them.
meanings.sent4: The night sky was as dark as pyrolusites, scattered with twinkling stars.
meanings.sent5: The museum displayed a magnificent specimen of pyrolusites, gleaming under the spotlight.

meanings.definition: A mineral consisting essentially of manganese dioxide and occurring in black or dark brown earthy or compact masses.
meanings.sent1: Scientists analyzed the composition of pyrolusites under a microscope.
meanings.sent2: Collectors sought rare pieces of pyrolusites to add to their mineral collections.
meanings.sent3: The children painted colorful pyrolusites on rocks during their art class.
meanings.sent4: The old house was as ancient as the pyrolusites found in the nearby caves.
meanings.sent5: The jeweler crafted a stunning necklace using polished pyrolusites as the centerpiece.
